name: axiom
description: Battle-tested Claude Code skills for modern xOS (iOS, iPadOS, watchOS, tvOS) development
author: Charles Wiltgen

skills.name: ios-build
skills.description: Use when ANY iOS build fails, test crashes, Xcode misbehaves, or environment issue occurs before debugging code. Covers build failures, compilation errors, dependency conflicts, simulator problems, environment-first diagnostics.

skills.name: ios-testing
skills.description: Use when writing ANY test, debugging flaky tests, making tests faster, or asking about Swift Testing vs XCTest. Covers unit tests, UI tests, fast tests without simulator, async testing, test architecture.

skills.name: ios-ui
skills.description: Use when building, fixing, or improving ANY iOS UI including SwiftUI, UIKit, layout, navigation, animations, design guidelines. Covers view updates, layout bugs, navigation issues, performance, architecture, Apple design compliance.

skills.name: ios-data
skills.description: Use when working with ANY data persistence, database, storage, CloudKit, migration, or serialization. Covers SwiftData, Core Data, GRDB, SQLite, Realm, CloudKit sync, file storage, Codable, migrations.

skills.name: ios-concurrency
skills.description: Use when writing ANY code with async, actors, threads, or seeing ANY concurrency error. Covers Swift 6 concurrency, @MainActor, Sendable, data races, async/await patterns, performance optimization.

skills.name: ios-performance
skills.description: Use when app feels slow, memory grows, battery drains, or diagnosing ANY performance issue. Covers memory leaks, profiling, Instruments workflows, retain cycles, performance optimization.

skills.name: ios-networking
skills.description: Use when implementing or debugging ANY network connection, API call, or socket. Covers URLSession, Network.framework, NetworkConnection, deprecated APIs, connection diagnostics, structured concurrency networking.

skills.name: ios-integration
skills.description: Use when integrating ANY iOS system feature: Siri, Shortcuts, Apple Intelligence, widgets, IAP, audio, haptics, localization, privacy. Covers App Intents, WidgetKit, StoreKit, AVFoundation, Core Haptics, App Shortcuts, Spotlight.

skills.name: ios-accessibility
skills.description: Use when fixing or auditing ANY accessibility issue: VoiceOver, Dynamic Type, color contrast, touch targets, WCAG compliance, App Store accessibility review.

skills.name: ios-ai
skills.description: Use when implementing ANY Apple Intelligence or on-device AI feature. Covers Foundation Models, @Generable, LanguageModelSession, structured output, Tool protocol, iOS 26 AI integration.

skills.name: ios-vision
skills.description: Use when implementing ANY computer vision feature: image analysis, object detection, pose detection, person segmentation, subject lifting, hand/body pose tracking.
